cleaned_text: Thermal Treatment Wrap Detox & Balance for hair spoiled by excessive treatments, our mask is the one-time-fix. The infusion of blueberry, blackberry, and sea kelp assist in detoxing and returning balance to the hair while strengthening to prevent breakage. The hair becomes shinier and silkier right from the first application. The pleasant heat development makes the application a wellness experience and ensures that the care substances can penetrate the hair structure particularly well. Natural extracts restore the original colour brilliance of the hair and reduce split ends. For excessively damaged hair. How To Use 1. Cleanse hair and dry lightly. 2. Slip the wrap over the head. For longer hair, tie your hair in a bun. Secure with the sticker at the front. 3. Leave on for 15-25 minutes and massage frequently and gently to spread the treatment thoroughly into their and roots 4. Wash hair thoroughly. Style as usual. Features and Benefits Choose our wrap as an at-home-spa-treatment without having to break the bank.
